meg as soon as you can you should return to the rpg. you will be gratly missed.

Megan Solmonson <tmrattrap@...> wrote:
Note: This weekend I'll be moving out on my own, but unfortunately I won't 
be able to take my computer with me for another 3 weeks or so.
Meaning I won't have the chance to post regularly as I would have liked.

As a result, I'll be leaving the NBW again. For the most part, that I don't 
want my e-mail overflowing with posts by the time I can establish an 
Internet connection again.

I would have liked to have RPed a lot more with you people, but I simply ran 
out of time. And it took too long for my characters to even be discovered, 
so that's that.

Diesel Runner, and the rest of her team can either disappear into the 
forgotten, or people can take them over.
It doesn't matter to me.

But, in any case, it was fun playing with you guys and girls again while I 
had the chance. ^-^
